content: henry s rabbit henry s rabbit is a simple pattern that knits up fast and is a joy to make and give all pieces are knitted in the round so there is very little seaming finishing touches eyes nose and whiskers can be embroidered on or embellished with buttons pieces of felt etc materials required worsted weight yarn app 150 yards in main color for body and 10 yards in secondary color for tail size 4 double pointed needles darning needle stuffing embroidery thread scrap yarn or other embellishments abbreviations co cast on dpn double pointed needles k knit kfb knit in the front and back of stitch st stitch sts stitches repeat repeat k2tog knit two stitches together pu pick up create a stitch from existing work ssk slip next two stitches knit-wise place them back onto left needle and then knit them together through the back loop 1 special notes pattern is written to be knitted using four double pointed needles each needle is separated within the rounds by a long dash -- if using a circular needle instead of dpns please use stitch markers to mark the places where the dpns would begin it is especially important to maintain the point between the beginning of the 1st needle and the end of the 3rd needle body 39 k16 k19 k2tog k19 k16 40 k all sts co 48 sts on 3 dpns 16 sts on each needle 41 k16 k19 k2tog k18 k16 1-2 k all sts 42 k all sts 3 k16 k3 *kfb k2* repeat 2 more times kfb k3 k16 43 k16 k18 k2tog k18 k16 4-8 k all sts 44 k all sts 9 k16 k5 *kfb k2* repeat 2 more times kfb k5 k16 45 k16 k17 k2tog k18 k16 10-14 k all sts 46 k all sts 15 k16 k7 *kfb k2* repeat 2 more times kfb k7 k16 47 k16 k17 k2tog k17 k16 16-20 k all sts 48 k all sts 21 k16 k9 *kfb k2* repeat 2 more times kfb k9 k16 49 k16 k17 k2tog k16 k16 22-26 k all sts 50 k all sts 27 k16 k11 *kfb k2* repeat 2 more times kfb k11 k16 51 k16 k16 k2tog k16 k16 28-32 k all sts 52 k all sts 33 k 16 k13 *kfb k2* repeat 2 more times kfb k13 k16 53 k16 k15 k2tog k16 k16 34-38 k all sts 54 k all sts at this point there should be 72 sts 16 40 16 at this point there should be 64 sts 16 32 16 place all 64 live sts on scrap yarn measure off about 4 yards of the yarn for finishing the body later then cut yarn 2 head 1st dpn pu 8 sts 1 for every other co st beg at 1st co st 14 k6 k7 ssk k1 k2tog k7 k6 2nd dpn pu 16 sts 1 for every co st 15 k all sts 3rd dpn pu
